notifications.welcome: Click ALT+M to unlock moori Foundation features
notifications.unlocked: moori Foundation features has been unlocked
notifications.locked: moori Foundation features has been locked

modal.title: moori Foundation features
modal.message: As of Shopware v6.5, the built-in features of `moori Foundation` are disabled. These can be made available again through an `Unlocker Plugin`. The `Unlocker Plugin` will be available at the start for a price of 10â‚¬ (excluding VAT) in the Shopware Community Store. The table explains the features and which of them remain free of charge.
